description: A third year, and captain of the volleyball club. He admires Haruka and would like Haruka to become the volleyball club`s manager. He has tendency to act cool, stripping and fantasizing in front of people, to the point of being considered a narcissist, causing those who know him to label him as a weirdo, especially Maki and her signature phrase of labeling him as "disgusting". He is also skilled at cooking and is a perfectionist at it.
name: Hosaka
